verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: Oil prices] [V: pared] [ARG1: losses] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump announced that the United States will withdraw from the 2015 Iran nuclear deal.
< p > Oil prices pared losses Tuesday after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: that the United States will withdraw from the 2015 Iran nuclear] deal.
